extracted_playbook.title: Identify Installed Version of SonicWall GMS and Analytics
extracted_playbook.description: Check the current installed versions of SonicWall GMS and Analytics to determine if they are affected by the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.condition: Are the installed versions of SonicWall GMS and Analytics affected?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade SonicWall GMS to Version 9.3.3
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade the SonicWall GMS to the latest version 9.3.3 to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade SonicWall Analytics to Version 2.5.2
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade the SonicWall Analytics to the latest version 2.5.2 to mitigate the vulnerability.
